page.title: Our Professional Services
page.description: From deep interior cleaning to professional exterior polishing, we treat every car with the care it deserves. Experience the difference with our premium detailing services.
page.readyDescription: Contact us today for a free consultation and quote on your next car detailing service. Our team is ready to make your vehicle shine — inside and out.
page.thisServiceAvailable: This service is available in our
page.packageDescription: We offer multiple detailing packages with different features and pricing levels to suit your needs and budget.
page.relatedServicesTitle: Related Services You Might Be Interested In

paintPolishServices.title: Paint Polish Services
paintPolishServices.subtitle: Restore, Refine & Refresh Your Paint
paintPolishServices.description: Not all paint is created equal and not all vehicles need the same level of polishing. We offer three levels of professional polishing tailored to your vehicle's needs, from enhancing gloss to removing heavy defects.
paintPolishServices.allPolishInclude: All polish services include polymer paint sealant for 6 months of protection

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional Auto Detailing Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive auto detailing services to keep your vehicle looking its best.
services.readyDescription: Our team of experienced professionals is ready to help you with your needs. Contact us today for a consultation.
services.allPolishInclude: All polish services include polymer paint sealant for 6 months of protection

exterior-detailing.label: Exterior Detailing
exterior-detailing.subtitle: More Than Just a Wash
exterior-detailing.description: Basic car washes often use dirty sponges, harsh chemicals, or automated brushes that leave behind swirl marks, scratches, and miss hidden areas like grilles or door jambs. Our Exterior Detailing service is designed to do the opposite — it safely and thoroughly cleans every part of your car's exterior using pH-neutral products and precise hand techniques.
features: Wheels & tires deep cleaned with pH-balanced wheel cleaner
Detailed brush cleaning (grille, emblems, trim, fuel cap, etc.)
Door jamb cleaning (door jambs & trunk jamb)
Contact Wash (two-bucket method) with pH-neutral shampoo
Paint decontamination treatment (iron remover + clay bar/mitt)
Air blow & microfiber towel for drying
benefits: Safe for ceramic-coated, waxed & polymer sealed vehicles
Prepares vehicle for protection or polishing

faqs.question: What is included in exterior detailing?
faqs.answer: Our exterior detailing includes pre-wash, deep cleaning, clay treatment, and protective wax application.

faqs.question: How long does it take?
faqs.answer: Typically 2-3 hours depending on the vehicle size and condition.

paint-decontamination.label: Paint Decontamination
paint-decontamination.subtitle: Remove What Washing Can't
paint-decontamination.description: Even after a proper wash, your vehicle's paint can still feel rough or look dull. That's because microscopic contaminants like brake dust, industrial fallout, road tar, and tree sap embed themselves into your paint over time — and regular washing won't remove them.
benefits: Prepares surface for ceramic coating or wax
Helps prevent long-term damage from embedded grime

faqs.question: How often should I decontaminate my paint?
faqs.answer: We recommend every 6-12 months depending on driving conditions.

gloss-enhancer.label: Gloss Enhancer
gloss-enhancer.subtitle: Ultimate Paint Shine & Protection
gloss-enhancer.description: A great option for newer or well-maintained vehicles, our Gloss Enhancer service deeply cleans the paint and boosts shine — removing embedded contaminants like brake dust, airborne particles, and rail dust. Finished with a fine polish to bring out clarity and gloss.
features: Fine machine polish to boost gloss
3-month polymer sealant (optional if ceramic coating is selected)
benefits: Contaminants can dull your paint even without scratches
Gloss enhancer revives shine without harsh polishing
Keeps your car looking fresh between full corrections

faqs.question: How long does the gloss enhancement last?
faqs.answer: Results typically last 3-6 months with proper maintenance.

engine-bay-detailing.label: Engine Bay Detailing
engine-bay-detailing.subtitle: Comprehensive Engine Bay Cleaning
engine-bay-detailing.description: Your engine bay is one of the most overlooked areas in automotive detailing — yet it's one of the most impactful when done right. Our Engine Bay Detailing service focuses on a safe, meticulous approach without using high-pressure water. We protect critical components, remove built-up grime, and finish with a non-greasy dressing that restores a deep, clean factory look and long-lasting protection.
features: Full inspection & preparation of engine bay
Covering of sensitive components (fuse box, alternator, wiring, sensors, etc.)
Soft detailing brushes for tight spots
Low-risk cleaning only (no pressure washer used)
Application of non-greasy dressing that restores shine
Product application that provides UV protection
benefits: Adds professional touch to vehicle presentation

faqs.question: Is it safe to clean the engine bay?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take all necessary precautions to protect sensitive components.

headlight-restoration.label: Headlight Restoration
headlight-restoration.subtitle: Clarity, Safety & Style
headlight-restoration.shortDescription: Restore cloudy headlights to like-new condition.
headlight-restoration.description: Faded, yellowed, or hazy headlights don't just look bad — they also reduce night visibility and compromise safety. Our professional Headlight Restoration service brings them back to life using a multi-stage sanding and polishing process that restores clarity, shine, and light output.
features: Machine polishing to restore optical clarity
benefits: Saves money (instead of costly headlight replacement)

faqs.question: How long does the restoration last?
faqs.answer: With proper maintenance, results can last 1-2 years.

headlight-taillight-tint.label: Headlight & Taillight Tint
headlight-taillight-tint.subtitle: Style, Protection & Custom Look
headlight-taillight-tint.description: Looking to enhance the look of your vehicle's front or rear lights? Our Headlight and Taillight Tint service adds a sleek, custom appearance to both headlights and taillights, while offering protection against UV rays, scratches, and oxidation. Choose from two bold shades, professionally installed with a 1-year warranty.
features: Precision-cut tint film in your choice of color
Professional installation with heat-shrinking for a seamless fit
1-year warranty against bubbling, peeling, or fading
benefits: Shields lights from UV, fading, & scratching
Backed by a 1-year no-fade, no-bubble warranty
Fully removable with no damage to factory lenses (maintains resale value)

faqs.question: Is tinting legal?
faqs.answer: We ensure all tinting meets local regulations and safety standards.

interior-detailing.label: Interior Detailing
interior-detailing.subtitle: Deep Clean, Restore & Refresh
interior-detailing.shortDescription: Thorough interior cleaning for a fresh, like-new cabin.
interior-detailing.description: Most quick car washes offer rushed interior wipe-downs that leave behind dust in vents, smudges on screens, and grime in tight spaces. But your vehicle deserves better. To us, Interior Detailing is an art — not a surface-level clean. We don't just make it look clean; we deep clean every accessible area using safe, professional-grade tools and products.
features: Dashboard, door panels, & center console wiped and detailed
Vents, buttons, knobs, & trim cleaned with dedicated soft detailing brushes
Steering wheel deep cleaned to a factory matte finish
Steam cleaning of high-touch surfaces for sanitization
benefits: Removes embedded dirt, dust, and grime from all surfaces
Sanitizes high-touch areas for better hygiene

faqs.question: How often should I get interior detailing?
faqs.answer: We recommend every 3-6 months depending on usage and lifestyle factors.

faqs.question: Is interior detailing safe for all materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, professional-grade products suitable for all interior materials.

floor-carpet-shampoo.label: Floor & Carpet Shampoo
floor-carpet-shampoo.subtitle: Deep Extraction for a Spotless Cabin
floor-carpet-shampoo.shortDescription: Steam and shampoo to remove stains and odors from carpets.
floor-carpet-shampoo.description: Your vehicle's carpets and floor mats endure daily wear from shoes, spills, and debris. Over time, embedded dirt, stains, and odors can make your interior look and smell less than fresh. Our Floor & Carpet Shampoo service uses professional-grade extraction equipment and specialized cleaning solutions to deep clean and sanitize your carpets, restoring them to like-new condition.
features: Pre-treatment of stains and heavily soiled areas
Hot water extraction with professional-grade equipment
Thorough vacuuming of all carpeted surfaces
benefits: Removes embedded dirt, stains, and odors
Restores original carpet color and texture

faqs.question: How long does carpet shampooing take?
faqs.answer: Typically 1-2 hours depending on the size and condition of the carpets.

faqs.question: Is carpet shampooing safe for all carpet types?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, professional-grade products suitable for all carpet materials.

pet-hair-removal.label: Pet Hair Removal
pet-hair-removal.subtitle: Deep Interior Clean
pet-hair-removal.shortDescription: Specialized removal of stubborn pet hair from fabrics.
pet-hair-removal.description: Pet hair can be incredibly stubborn, embedding itself deep into fabric fibers and becoming nearly impossible to remove with regular vacuuming. Our specialized Pet Hair Removal service uses professional-grade tools and techniques to completely eliminate pet hair from all interior surfaces, leaving your vehicle clean and hair-free.
features: Specialized pet hair removal tools and brushes
Fabric brush treatment for embedded hair
Lint roller treatment for stubborn areas
Steam cleaning to loosen embedded hair
Detailed cleaning of all fabric surfaces
benefits: Completely removes all pet hair from interior

faqs.question: How effective is professional pet hair removal?
faqs.answer: Our specialized tools and techniques can remove 99% of pet hair, including deeply embedded hair that regular vacuuming misses.

faqs.question: Is pet hair removal safe for all interior materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, gentle methods that won't damage any interior materials.

fabric-seat-shampoo.label: Fabric Seat Shampoo
fabric-seat-shampoo.subtitle: Deep Clean, Sanitize & Refresh
fabric-seat-shampoo.shortDescription: Extract and sanitize fabric seats to lift stains and odors.
fabric-seat-shampoo.description: Fabric seats are prone to absorbing spills, stains, and odors over time. Our Fabric Seat Shampoo service uses professional-grade hot water extraction equipment and specialized cleaning solutions to deep clean, sanitize, and refresh your fabric seats, restoring them to like-new condition.
features: Pre-treatment of stains and heavily soiled areas
Hot water extraction with professional equipment
benefits: Removes embedded dirt, stains, and odors
Restores original fabric color and texture

faqs.question: How long does fabric seat shampooing take?
faqs.answer: Typically 1-2 hours depending on the number of seats and their condition.

faqs.question: Is fabric shampooing safe for all fabric types?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, professional-grade products suitable for all fabric materials.

leather-seat-treatment.label: Leather Seat Treatment
leather-seat-treatment.subtitle: Clean, Condition & Protect
leather-seat-treatment.description: Leather seats require special care to maintain their luxurious appearance and prevent cracking or fading. Our Leather Seat Treatment service uses premium leather cleaning and conditioning products to gently clean, nourish, and protect your leather seats, keeping them supple and beautiful for years to come.
features: Gentle leather cleaning with pH-balanced products
Deep cleaning of leather surfaces and crevices
UV protection to prevent fading and cracking
Final buffing for a luxurious finish
benefits: Protects against UV damage and fading

faqs.question: How often should leather seats be treated?
faqs.answer: We recommend every 3-6 months to maintain optimal leather condition.

faqs.question: Is leather treatment safe for all leather types?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use premium products safe for all leather materials, including perforated leather.

ceramic-coating.label: Ceramic Coating
ceramic-coating.subtitle: Elevate Your Vehicle's Defense
ceramic-coating.shortDescription: Durable ceramic protection with extreme gloss.
ceramic-coating.description: Ceramic Coating is the ultimate paint protection solution, providing years of durable protection against environmental contaminants, UV damage, and everyday wear. Our professional-grade ceramic coating creates a molecular bond with your paint, forming an incredibly hard, hydrophobic surface that repels water, dirt, and contaminants while maintaining exceptional gloss and clarity.

faqs.question: How long does ceramic coating last?
faqs.answer: Professional ceramic coatings can last 2-5 years with proper maintenance and care.

faqs.question: Is ceramic coating worth the investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, ceramic coating provides long-term protection, easier maintenance, and can significantly increase your vehicle's resale value.

paint-sealant.label: Paint Sealant
paint-sealant.subtitle: Synthetic Protection & Enhanced Gloss
paint-sealant.description: Paint Sealant provides excellent protection for your vehicle's paint with a synthetic polymer formula that bonds to the surface, creating a durable barrier against environmental contaminants. This professional-grade sealant offers 6-12 months of protection while enhancing gloss and making maintenance easier.
features: Protection against UV and environmental damage

faqs.question: How long does paint sealant last?
faqs.answer: Professional paint sealants typically last 6-12 months depending on driving conditions and maintenance.

faqs.question: What's the difference between sealant and ceramic coating?
faqs.answer: Sealant provides 6-12 months protection and is more affordable, while ceramic coating lasts 2-5 years but costs more.

car-wax.label: Car Wax
car-wax.subtitle: Traditional Wax Protection
car-wax.shortDescription: Classic wax finish for rich gloss and protection.
car-wax.description: Car Wax is the traditional approach to paint protection, using premium carnauba or hybrid wax formulas to create a beautiful, deep gloss finish. This classic method provides 2-4 months of protection while enhancing the natural beauty of your paint with a warm, rich appearance that only wax can achieve.
features: Premium carnauba or hybrid wax application
Protection against UV and environmental damage

faqs.question: How often should I wax my car?
faqs.answer: We recommend waxing every 2-4 months or after every 3-4 washes to maintain optimal protection.

faqs.question: What's the difference between wax and sealant?
faqs.answer: Wax provides a warmer, richer gloss and lasts 2-4 months, while sealant offers longer protection (6-12 months) with a different appearance.

paint-polish.label: Paint Polish
paint-polish.subtitle: Professional Paint Enhancement
paint-polish.shortDescription: Restore your vehicle's paint to showroom condition.
paint-polish.description: Professional paint polishing is the art of restoring your vehicle's paint to its original glory. Our Paint Polish service uses advanced techniques and premium products to remove swirl marks, light scratches, and oxidation, revealing the true depth and clarity of your paint. This process enhances gloss, improves paint condition, and prepares the surface for protection.
benefits: Removes swirl marks and light scratches
Restores original paint depth and clarity

faqs.question: How often should I polish my paint?
faqs.answer: We recommend every 6-12 months depending on driving conditions and paint care routine.

faqs.question: Is paint polishing safe for all paint types?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, professional techniques suitable for all paint finishes including clear coat.

one-step-polish.label: One-Step Polish
one-step-polish.subtitle: Swirl Removal & Gloss Enhancement
one-step-polish.shortDescription: Correct minor imperfections and enhance gloss in one step.
one-step-polish.description: Our One-Step Polish service is perfect for vehicles that need a quick refresh without extensive correction work. This efficient process combines light paint correction with gloss enhancement in a single step, making it ideal for well-maintained vehicles or those with minor imperfections. It's faster than multi-stage correction while still delivering excellent results.
features: Light swirl mark and scratch removal
benefits: Faster service time compared to multi-stage correction
Removes light swirl marks and minor scratches
Significantly enhances paint gloss and shine

faqs.question: When should I choose one-step polish over multi-stage correction?
faqs.answer: One-step polish is ideal for well-maintained vehicles with minor imperfections, while multi-stage correction is better for heavily damaged paint.

faqs.question: How long does one-step polish take?
faqs.answer: Typically 2-4 hours depending on vehicle size and paint condition.

paint-correction.label: Paint Correction
paint-correction.subtitle: Multi-Stage Perfection & Showroom Finish
paint-correction.shortDescription: Eliminate scratches, swirls and imperfections for flawless finish.
paint-correction.description: Paint Correction is our most comprehensive paint restoration service, designed to eliminate severe swirl marks, scratches, and paint defects through a multi-stage process. This intensive service uses various polishing compounds and techniques to achieve a showroom-quality finish, revealing the true depth and clarity of your vehicle's paint.
features: Heavy swirl mark and scratch removal
benefits: Eliminates severe swirl marks and scratches
Reveals true paint depth and clarity

faqs.question: How long does paint correction take?
faqs.answer: Typically 6-12 hours depending on paint condition and vehicle size.

faqs.question: Is paint correction safe for all paint types?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use safe, professional techniques suitable for all paint finishes, including single-stage and clear coat.
